column2: You are old, very old. You are starting to turn into a creature of many worlds...
You have become a novice spellcaster.
Getting older and older, your magic abilities grow stronger.
You have become a regular spellcaster.
Few creatures are older than you, so there are few spellcasters more powerful than you.
You have become a powerful spellcaster.
You are old beyond reckoning. Your magic powers become unmatched.
You have become a legendary spellcaster.
Your experiments with magic bring some unexpected results.
This character has limited magic abilities.
This character has average magic abilities.
This character is a powerful spellcaster.
This character is one of the greatest casters in known history.
